chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem: According to tracking, my package was handed over. However, it wasn't delivered at our place nor at our neighbor's. Thank you for your help,

Hi there,
 
The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered.
 
We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID, ---- ONLY IF THE ORDER IS AN IPHONE 12/13/14 (to remove) --- along with a proof of address.
 

Please send us a Proof of Delivery (POD) with the customer's signature, a photo of the package being handed to the customer, or a screenshot showing the GPS location of the delivery, within 2 business days. 

Please note: any other POD will not be considered relevant (ie: unsigned document or unclear photo).
 
- If a POD is provided, a police report will be required from the customer to process the claim. --- ONLY FOR ORDERS OF IPHONES 12/13/14 (to remove) --- Only reports requiring the customer to go to the police station will be accepted.---
- If no POD is provided within 2 business days: only ID + Certificate of Non-receipt + --- ONLY FOR ORDERS OF IPHONES 12/13/14 (to remove) --- proof of address --- will be required.
 
If the package is lost and the customer has provided all the necessary paperwork they can choose between a refund or a reshipment. In this case, we recommend that you block the device, if possible.
 
In case the order is not found and the customer chooses a replacement, are you able to send one?
 
If not, we'll handle the refund within --- CHOOSE ONE --- FOR IPHONES 12/13/14: 5 business days // FOR OTHER MODELS: 3 business days ---.
 
Thanks for your help.
 
Looking forward to hearing from you,
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

I have informed my logistics partner of this issue and await the POD.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD.  Please let us know if the customer wishes to contest.

Regards,
RK
